Categorize this IT Ticket:

please automatically add the colombia number the for meetings pm re update create colombian number conferences same other locations hello please automatically add colombia number meetings similar other regards update create colombian number conferences same other locations dear further recent communication believe query has resolved resolution response please let further assistance matter reference number summary create colombian number conferences same other locations resolver description kind regards ext ref msg
